actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Claws attacks and one Tempest Trident attack or it makes three Lightning Ray attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tempest Trident
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 16 (2d12+3) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) cold. A creature hit by this: knocked prone (DC 16 Str negates) by a gust of wind channeled through the trident.

actions.name: Lightning Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, 150 ft., one target, 18 (4d8) lightning.

actions.name: Crown of Water (1/Day)
actions.desc: The water on devil's head erupts in a geyser. Each creature within 10 ft. of devil: 35 (10d6) cold (DC 16 Con half). For 1 min when a creature enters a space within 10 ft. of the devil for 1st time on a turn or starts its turn there that creature: DC 16 Con save or take 10 (3d6) cold.

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magic darkness doesn't impede its darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Influence Weather
special_abilities.desc: Nearby weather responds to devil's desires. At start of each min devil can choose to change precipitation and wind within 1 mile of it by one stage up or down (no action required). This works like the changing weather conditions aspect of the control weather spell except devil can't change temperature and conditions change immediately.
